thread.title: Webcast Alert: BorgWarner 2015 Third Quarter Results Conference Call
thread.title_full: Webcast Alert: BorgWarner 2015 Third Quarter Results Conference Call - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Webcast Alert: BorgWarner 2015 Third Quarter Results Conference Call
text:
BorgWarner Inc.
AUBURN HILLS, Mich. , Sept. 17, BorgWarner Inc. (NYSE: BWA) announces the following Webcast:
What:
BorgWarner 2015 Third Quarter Results Conference Call
When:
October 29 @ 9:30am Eastern Time
Where:
http://www.borgwarner.com/en/Investors/default.aspx
How:
Live over the Internet -- Simply log on to the web at the address above.
Contact:
Ken Lamb
248-754-0884
klamb@borgwarner.com
If you are unable to participate during the live webcast, the call will be archived at ( http://www.borgwarner.com/en/Investors/default.aspx )
BorgWarner Inc. (NYSE: BWA) is a product leader in highly engineered components and systems for powertrains around the world. Operating manufacturing and technical facilities in 57 locations in 18 countries, the company delivers innovative powertrain solutions to improve fuel economy, reduce emissions and enhance performance. For more information, please visit borgwarner.com.
To view the original version on PR Newswire, visit: http://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/webcast-alert-borgwarner-2015-third-quarter-results-conference-call-300145185.html
